Name: Dok du Nord
Review Text: Good food in a friendly restaurant. Special attraction is the river, big cargo ships sail a few meters from your table. Staff is attentive, and it is not far away from downtown Amsterdam if you taken the ferry tot Meeuwenlaan it is a five minuten walk from the terminal

Name: Dok du Nord
Review Text:
Very nice location in the water side of Amsterdam Noord.
The food was ok but the prices are bit spicy..
And unfortunately with a nice weather the staff is a bit out of order..
